availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Daviess County Court } Sct
Special Term February 1 -- 1862

"Preston H. Brown Esqr this day personally appeared in Court and tendered to the Court in writing (which is herewith ordered to be filed) his resignation as a Justice of the Peace of district No 1. in Daviess County, which is received, and the Court recommends to His Excellency Beriah Magoffin Governor of this Commonwealth, William H. Chatham, Samuel R. Ewing and Curvin L Balee as suitable persons to fill the vacancy thus occasioned."

A Copy Attest
Marcus L. Ogden clk
Daviess County Court

Daviess Co
J. P. Dist
No. 1.
Wm H Chatham
appd. Feby 4 1862
